item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美股打破今年第36个纪录俄罗斯对人民币的吸收有可能达到极限。安泰生物科技公司（Anthem Bioscience）考虑首次公开募股。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks break 36th record this year. Russia’s yuan uptake risks hitting limits. Anthem Bioscience weighs an IPO. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 库存减少给美联储的信息蒙上阴影，石油微幅走高
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发表证词后，美国再次出现库存减少的迹象，使美联储降息时间表的不确定性黯然失色，石油价格因此走高。【原文：Oil edged higher as signs of another inventory draw in the US eclipsed uncertainty on the timeline for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts after testimony from Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 切尔西俱乐部老板的 "廉价资金时代 "结束了
item.description:
加利福尼亚私募股权公司的投资组合公司中至少有 100 亿美元的不良债务，这是收购行业目前所面临困难的一个缩影。【原文：

The Californian private equity firm has at least $10 billion in distressed debt among its portfolio companies, a snapshot of the difficulties the buyout industry is facing right now.

item.title: 中国人民银行准备平息反弹，中国债券交易员划出红线
item.description: 债券交易员正准备好让中国开始回击创纪录的低收益率，中国央行现在拥有 "数千亿 "人民币的证券可供出售。【原文：Bond traders are getting ready for China to start pushing back on record-low yields, with the central bank now armed with “hundreds of billions” of yuan of securities at its disposal to sell.】

item.title: 股票交易者驾驭中国三中全会指南
item.description: 下周，中国最高领导人将举行高规格会议，中国股市的赢家和输家将备受关注。【原文：A high-profile gathering of China’s top leaders next week will be keenly watched for the winners and losers in the country’s stocks, which have struggled lately in bear-market territory.】

item.title: 中国股市有望上涨；圣保罗 500 指数因鲍威尔而企稳：市场综述
item.description: 周三，在关键经济数据公布前，中国相关股票有望上涨，而美国股市则触及新高，因为交易员们坚持美联储今年将降息的押注。【原文：China-related shares were primed for gains Wednesday ahead of key economic data, while US equities touched a fresh peak as traders held to bets the Federal Reserve will cut rates this year.】

item.title: 美国银行聘用瑞银顶级保险投资银行家松坂乔治
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）已聘请瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）保险投资银行部全球主管 George Matsuzaka。【原文：Bank of America Corp. has hired UBS Group AG’s global head of insurance investment banking George Matsuzaka, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: DeFi 最热门领域的利害关系
item.description: 在本期彭博加密时事通讯中，Sidhartha Shukla 描述了加密货币重构之争的利害关系。加密货币目前最热门的创新可以说是重构，它通过允许在此过程中使用的数字代币同时加固多个应用程序，放大了保护区块链所获得的回报。【原文：In this edition of the Bloomberg Crypto newsletter, Sidhartha Shukla describes what’s at stake in the fight over crypto restaking.Crypto’s hottest innovation right now is arguably restaking, which amplifies the returns earned for securing a blockchain by allowing the digital tokens used in the process to fortify multiple applications at once.】

item.title: 普渡制药公司赢得谈判萨克雷新交易的短暂窗口期
item.description: 普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma LP）获得了与萨克勒家族成员谈判新协议的两个月时间，因为在美国最高法院否决了早前达成的 60 亿美元和解协议后，OyxContin 制造商及其所有者都在为可能出现的阿片类药物民事诉讼浪潮做准备。【原文：Purdue Pharma LP secured a two-month window to negotiate a new pact with members of the Sackler family as the OyxContin maker and its owners brace for a potential wave of civil opioid lawsuits after the US Supreme Court scuttled an earlier $6 billion settlement.】

item.title: 尽管 S&P 500 指数反弹，卖空者第二季度仍获利 100 亿美元
item.description: 做空者在今年第二季度赚得盆满钵满，即使在整体市场持续走高的情况下，他们也能成功地对股票下注。【原文：Short sellers had a lucrative second quarter this year, managing to successfully bet against stocks even as the overall market continued to grind higher.】

item.title: 债券交易员七月每天都在为国债反弹下注
item.description: 随着美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔强调美国通胀数据的重要性，交易员们押注 27 万亿美元的美国国债市场将出现反弹。【原文：Traders are betting on a rally in the $27 trillion US Treasury market as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell casts a spotlight on the importance of US inflation data.】

item.title: 加拿大对冲基金交易员因伪造回报被判四年监禁
item.description: 加拿大一名交易员因收受投资者数百万美元，然后向他们提供虚假的回报信息，被判入狱四年。【原文：A trader in Canada received a four-year jail sentence after accepting millions of dollars from investors, then giving them false information about their returns.】

item.title: 私人信贷经理打上华尔街最不受喜爱的标签
item.description: 华尔街最受困的金融标签之一已悄然进军私人信贷市场。【原文：One of the most beleaguered financial labels on Wall Street has quietly been making inroads in the private credit market.】

item.title: 智利的锂项目可能超过政府目标
item.description: 智利政府表示，私营企业对锂交易的浓厚兴趣意味着，到 2026 年底，智利将超额完成开发三到四个新项目的目标。【原文：Chile’s government said that strong interest from private firms in lithium deals meant it could exceed its goal of three to four new projects in development by the end of 2026.】

item.title: 高盛收购泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）舞台搭建商 TAIT 大部分股份
item.description: 高盛另类投资公司（Goldman Sachs Alternatives）的私募股权业务正在收购泰勒斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）Eras 巡演舞台设计工程公司 TAIT 的多数股权。【原文：The private equity business of Goldman Sachs Alternatives is buying a majority stake in TAIT, the engineering firm that designed the stage for Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour.】

item.title: 股价上涨 80% 后，特斯拉成为 ARKK 有史以来最大的权重股
item.description: 过去几个月，特斯拉公司股价大幅反弹，使得这家电动汽车制造商在凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）价值 62 亿美元的旗舰交易所交易基金中的权重达到历史最高水平。【原文：The big rebound in Tesla Inc. shares over the past few months has pushed the electric-vehicle maker to its highest-ever weighting in Cathie Wood’s flagship $6.2 billion exchange-traded fund.】

item.title: 比特币矿工 TeraWulf 将扩建用于人工智能托管的能源基础设施
item.description: 比特币矿商TeraWulf公司提前偿还了剩余债务，并表示这将为该公司提供更大的灵活性，以利用对能源基础设施不断升级的需求。【原文：Bitcoin miner TeraWulf Inc. paid down its remaining debt early, saying it will provide the company greater flexibility to capitalize on escalating demand for energy infrastructure that can be deployed for uses such as powering generative AI technology.】

item.title: 光街基金、鲸岩基金 2024 年业绩飙升，超过一些规模较大的竞争基金
item.description: 今年上半年，以技术为重点的股票对冲基金鲸岩资本管理公司（Whale Rock Capital Management）和光街资本管理公司（Light Street Capital Management）业绩飙升，超过了市场和一些较大的竞争对手。【原文：Tech-focused equity hedge funds Whale Rock Capital Management and Light Street Capital Management soared in the first half of the year, outpacing markets and some larger rivals.】

item.title: 咖啡烘焙商 Lavazza 称 2025 年咖啡价格将继续上涨
item.description: 由于主要种植者的供应短缺，咖啡价格在2025年中期之前将持续上涨，而随着新的森林砍伐法规的实施，欧洲消费者将为他们的咖啡因消费支付更高的价格。【原文：Coffee prices will keep rising until the middle of 2025 due to supply shortages in key growers, with European consumers set to pay even more for their caffeine hit as new deforestation regulations kick in.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的外汇交易现在几乎 100% 以人民币结算
item.description: 在制裁迫使莫斯科交易所停止美元和欧元交易之后，人民币在俄罗斯外汇市场上的份额已达到 99.6%。【原文：The share of yuan on Russia’s foreign exchange market has reached 99.6% after sanctions forced the Moscow Exchange to halt trading in US dollars and the euro.】

item.title: 西班牙公路运营商计划为波多黎各公路出售 4.24 亿美元债务
item.description: 西班牙高速公路运营商 Abertis 的一家子公司正在考虑借款 4.24 亿美元，为波多黎各四条收费公路的资本项目提供资金。【原文：A subsidiary of Spanish highway operator Abertis is considering borrowing $424 million to fund capital projects for four Puerto Rico toll roads.】

item.title: 耶伦为拜登辩护称其会议 "极为有效
item.description: 财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）在众议院听证会上回答有关总统精神敏锐度的问题时说，她的上司乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在他们都参加过的冗长会议中 "非常有效"。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her boss Joe Biden has been “extremely effective” in lengthy meetings that they’ve both attended, in response to a question during a House hearing about the president’s mental acuity.】

item.title: RTX 即将达成向 Arcline 出售部门的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，RTX 公司正在就向私募股权公司 Arcline Investment Management 出售其柯林斯航空航天部门的一个单位进行深入谈判。【原文：RTX Corp. is in advanced talks to sell a unit of its Collins Aerospace division to private equity firm Arcline Investment Management, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普伊格将加入西班牙基准股票指数，梅里亚将退出市场
item.description: 奢华美容公司 Puig Brands SA 将被纳入西班牙基准股票指数，取代 Melia Hotels International SA，这是一年半以来该蓝筹股指数的首次调整。【原文：Luxury beauty company Puig Brands SA will be added to Spain’s benchmark stock index, replacing Melia Hotels International SA, in the first revamp of the blue-chip gauge in a year and a half.】

item.title: 加拿大民调显示，保守党领袖在经济问题上与特鲁多的差距拉大
item.description: 在 "谁是最佳经济管理者 "这一问题上，加拿大保守党领导人在选民中的领先优势进一步扩大，这凸显了贾斯汀-特鲁多总理面临的政治挑战。【原文：The leader of Canada’s Conservative Party has opened up a bigger lead among voters on the question of who would be the best economic manager, underscoring the political challenges faced by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.】

item.title: 鲍威尔呼吁提供通胀消退的证据，国债下跌
item.description: 由于美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向华盛顿立法者表示，他希望获得更多通胀降温的证据，从而增强了市场对今年降息的现有押注，美国国债因此下滑。【原文：US Treasuries slipped as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell told Washington lawmakers he wants more evidence of cooling inflation, bolstering the market’s existing bets on interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 耶伦附和鲍威尔称劳动力市场通胀程度降低
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，劳动力市场对美国经济通胀的推动作用已不再达到大流行病复苏初期的程度，这与美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）此前的言论不谋而合。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the labor market is no longer driving inflation in the US economy to the extent it was earlier in the pandemic recovery, echoing earlier comments by Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell.】

item.description: 根据摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Investors should brace themselves for a bout of stock market volatility this week after a lengthy period of calm, based on a warning from JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading desk.】
